tech_news.title: Apple just named a new AI chief with Google and Microsoft expertise, as John Giannandrea steps down - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: His replacement is Amar Subramanya, a highly regarded Microsoft executive who spent 16 years at Google, most recently leading engineering for the Gemini Assistant. It's a savvy hire, given that Subramanya knows the competition intimately.

tech_news.title: Samsung Debuts Its First Trifold Months Ahead of Folding iPhone - Bloomberg.com
tech_news.description: Samsung Electronics Co. unveiled its first so-called trifold smartphone, flaunting its engineering prowess in foldable devices even as the broader category has yet to catch on with mainstream consumers.

tech_news.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 is $70 off, beating its Black Friday price - The Verge
tech_news.description: The Apple Watch Series 11 is even cheaper than it was on Black Friday, with the 42mm base configuration selling for $329 ($70 off) at Amazon and other retailers.
